title: Software Developer - Senior
description: I am a self-taught person, always in search of knowledge. My learning curve is always in a positive range, constantly growing. I do not limit myself to the information I currently have, I constantly seek to expand in order to be more versatile when it comes to performing in my area. If there is any tool that I do not know or do not fully master, I will do my best to specialize in it, and thus be more useful and effective every day.

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: I work with technologies that use JavaScript as a language. I am specifically using Vue and React Native. I am in charge of adding improvements, correcting errors, performing unit tests, preparing the deployment of apps. I have also been in charge of conducting technical interviews for new hires, as well as correcting and assisting other developers on other projects.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: I was in charge of the maintenance, improvements, and corrections of a web platform that is a stock of graphic resources. I handled everything that had to do with JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. At certain times I also worked with PHP. I participated in the renewal of the website using the Nuxt framework.

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: I worked with several technologies, adding improvement to "Clearing Informes" software. I developed on asp.net, asp classic, as well as web development in general, I also used Oracle database. I was in charge of giving maintenance to a system that shows the patrimonial or credit solvency of the people.

experience.title: Database Analyst
experience.description: Analyst in database SQL Server, I worked with Data Warehouse, the creation of Stored Procedure, data migration, query optimization, and bugs correction.

experience.title: Web Developer

In charge of the management of different projects, administrator of instances EC2 and RDS and components SQS and S3 of Amazon Web Service. Project leader.

experience.title: Full-stack Developer

experience.title: Web Developer
